verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: pulled] out [ARG1: of the United Nations Human Rights Council] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-PRP: in protest of what it perceives as a “ chronic bias against Israel] . ”
The Trump administration pulled out of the United Nations Human Rights Council on Tuesday in protest of [ARG1: what] [ARG0: it] [V: perceives] [ARG2: as a “ chronic bias against Israel] . ”
